nodes.bodyText:
did you change the loadConnectionUserCouplingModeFromConfig?
isn't it no more bound to a scope?

scopeId is not used in loadConnectionUserCouplingModeFromConfig(), so it has been removed from the method signature.
See AuthenticationLogic.java:246
I dont' recall why we commented this code but, looking at it, I would leave it here for a while, waiting for a proper analysis about its role
That code is commented since 1620737 (committed on 22/12/2017), which is the first commit containing this file. This means that this code has always been a comment in its entire life.
For all of this class I would use scopeId and id for as argument names so we can fall back on values coming from the EntityAttributes
It is possibile to change this to use Pattern?

Get this from ConsoleMessages.error().
Also for other occurrencies on this class
Formatting?? 😁 👼
